metadata.title: Tantive IV
metadata.author: Chrono Vortex
metadata.description:
CREDITS: Hull sprite drawn with help from R4V3-0N Princess Leia sprite drawn by R4V3-0N and Moreorlesser
Originally on a mission to deliver medical supplies to members of the Rebel Alliance, the crew of this vessel now find themselves in a strange universe whose Rebellion stands for terror and oppression.
